PtSituationElement.LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[6]</b> <b>Pelham Bay Park-bound trains skip Brook Av, Cypress Av, E 143 St, E 149 St and Longwood Av</b>Late Nights, 9:45 PM to 5 AM, Wed to Fri, Nov 22 - 24<br><br>For service <i>to</i> these stations, take the [6] to Hunts Point Av and transfer to a Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].<br><br>For service <i>from </i>these stations, take the [6] to 3 Av-138 St and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].<br><b><br>

PtSituationElement.LongDescription: <b><i>PRIORITY REPAIRS</i><br clear=left>[M] Service ends early between 71 Av and Essex St<br clear=left>[E] [F] [R] trains provide alternate service</b>Evenings, 8:30 PM to 11:59 PM, Mon to Thu, Nov 20 - 23 <br><br>[M] service operates between <b>Essex St</b> and <b>Myrtle Av </b>and via the [J] <i>to/from</i> Broadway Junction.<br>[M] shuttle service operates between <b>Metropolitan Av</b> and <b>Myrtle Wyckoff Avs</b>.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle width=70%><tr><td><font size=3><b>Travel Alternatives</b></font><td align=right>[TP]</table><br>[R]* trains make [M] stops between 71 Av and Queens Plaza.<br>[E] trains make all [M] stops between Queens Plaza and 5 Av/53 St.<br>[F] trains make all [M] stops between 47-50 Sts and Delancey St/Essex St.<br><br> Transfer between <b>[F]</b> and <b>[R]</b> trains at Roosevelt Av or 34 St-Herald Sq.<br> Transfer between <b>[E]</b> and <b>[F]</b> trains at W 4 St.<br> Transfer between <b>[F]</b> and <b>[M]</b> trains at Delancey St/Essex St.<br><br><i>*Please review [R] advisories for additional information that may affect your trip.<br><br></i>Please use the following guide to arrive at your station before end of service.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle width=65% border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=3 rules=rows frame=hsides><tr bgcolor=#FAF8CC><td colspan=2><b>To 71 Av:</b><td> <td colspan=2><b>To Broadway Junction:</b><tr><td>Broadway Junction<td align=right>8:43 PM<td rowspan=5> <td>71 Av<td align=right>8:30 PM<tr><td>Myrtle Av<td align=right>8:53 PM<td>Roosevelt Av<td align=right>8:40 PM<tr><td>Essex St<td align=right>9:05 PM<td>Queens Plaza<td align=right>8:51 PM<tr><td>W 4 St<td align=right>9:11 PM<td>47-50 Sts<td align=right>8:59 PM<tr><td>47-50 Sts<td align=right>9:19 PM<td>B'way-Lafayette St<td align=right>9:09 PM</table><br><b>Reminder:</b> No <b>[M]</b> service between Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs and Myrtle Av.</font> <br><br></font><table class=plannedworkTableStyle border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=5 rules=none frame=box><td> [ad] <td><font size=1>This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning<br>your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay. </font></table><br><b><br>

PtSituationElement.LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[N] Coney Island-bound trains run express from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to 59 St, Brooklyn</b></font>Late Nights, 10:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Nov 20 - 24<br><br>Trains stop at 36 St.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> Union St, 4 Av-9 St, Prospect Av and 25 St, take the [N] to 36 St and transfer to a<br><i>local</i> Manhattan-bound [D] [N] or [R].<br><br>For service <i>from </i>these stations, take the [D] [N] or [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer to a<br>Coney Island-bound [N].<br><br>For service <i>to</i> 45 St and 53 St, take the [N] to 59 St and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [N] <i>local</i> or [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [N] or [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [N].<br><b><br>
